title: shankha cakra gadA
sahitya:
shankha cakra gadApANim aham vandE shrI shArnga nandaka kaustubha dhAriNam vandE


anupallavi

 pankEruha caraNam padmAvatI ramaNam sankaTApa haraNam sadAbhakta bharaNam 
kunkuma pankila gAtram pankaja vishAla nEtram shankara sannuti pAtram vEnkaTa varada kSEtram


caraNam   gajEndra samrakSaNam garuDavAha vicakSaNam ajEndrAdi vilakSaNam amrta sAra bhakSaNam
ajAmiLa prbhrtyasnEka dAsAdi santaraNam bhajE pUrNacandrikAnga guruguhAnta karaNam
kujAti greaha vihitam virajA nadI sthitam sajAtIyAdi rahitam nijAnanda bOdha hitam
